projects.name: Educational Website
projects.description: Created a responsive website by utilizing HTML, CSS , and JavaScript , with the React framework on the front end and Django on the back end.  Website is live and have 3000+ visitors in 2-weeks.

projects.name: Attack On Lattice(SVP) Using KNN
projects.description: Enhance the models by training them with the lattice structure dataset.  Applied 1 non- liner model(KNN) of machine learning on 2-dimension, 4-dimension & 10-dimension lattice & accuracy is-74%, 67% & 61%.

experiences.description: Implementing cryptographic algorithms in C++ .  This involves translating mathematical algorithms into functional code , ensuring the implementations efficiency, accuracy, and security.

Designed and implemented scalable 20+ responsive pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, React .  After final implementation these pages meet industry and company standards for SEO and have thousands of visitors daily.
